thread.title: Nishikori holds off Kyrgios to advance in Shanghai
thread.title_full: Nishikori holds off Kyrgios to advance in Shanghai - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Justin Bergman, Associated Press
title: Nishikori holds off Kyrgios to advance in Shanghai
text: SHANGHAI (AP) â€” Kei Nishikori overcame a stiff challenge from an emotional Nick Kyrgios to advance to the third round of the Shanghai Masters with a 1-6, 6-4, 6-4 win on Wednesday.
